Description: Tirio Antique Magic Roman Half Hunter Black Steel Hollow Skeleton Hand Wind Mechanical Pocket Watch Features: 100% Brand New and High Quality!Magic Roman Half Hunter Pocket Watch Renaissance Antique Look.Scratch resistant mineral glass Skeleton Dial with Roman Numerals Display.Stainless steel watch case makes the watch more durable.Metal Chain Length 320mm ,Dial Diameter 48 mm.Nice gift for your father ,your family or your friends Product Details: Product Dimensions: 3.6 x 3.5 x 0.9 inchesShipping Weight: 1.6 ounces Description Hand wind mechanical watches make superb birthday or Christmas gifts, in addition to great wedding and groomsmen gifts. They are also ideal for corporate gifts or for the retirement of a long time employee. Here is an example of a pocket watch with a half hunter skeleton design for anyone that wants the classic look and practicality of a quality mechanical wind up pocket watch. The watch can be easily set.The watch does not required battery as it work's on whind up mechanism. Please Take Attention: 1. Once you receive the mechanical watch: ●Setting time: Pull the crown away from base of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until reaching the exact time. ●Winding the watch: Push the crown back into place along the base of the watch and winding up the watch clockwise rotation till you feel tight. 2. Do not setting the Calendar during the time between 21:00PM--3:00AM. 3. For using the mechanical watch in normal situation, the time running will be difference around -15 ~ +35 Seconds per day.
